QuestData.Title: Into the Academy
QuestData.Description: The sunken structure on the other side of this bridge was once called Nar'thalas Academy: the center of magical studies in all of Azeroth. You should have seen her in her full splendor.$b$bThe Tidestone should be locked up within. I dare not enter, but you - my champion - you go with my blessing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter the halls of the Nar'thalas Academy.
